name: brightness

brightness noun [U]
(OF LIGHT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of shining with, or of producing, a lot of light: The brightness of the snow made him blink. The moon's brightness fluctuates as it orbits the planet.

(OF COLOUR)
